item.title: Started RSS feed for website updates.
item.description: Started RSS feed for website updates. Will provide updates on various Marcell related things :).

item.title: CAV 2020
item.description: My paper on Maximum Causal Entropy Specification Inference from Demonstrations was accepted (with very positive reviews) into CAV 2020! Unfortunately, the py-aiger tool paper did not fair as well. C'est la vie I suppose. Particularly during these trying times.
